definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
transponder/electronic device that responds to a radio code
pinyin: yi4 pin2 lei2 da2 shou1 fa1 ji1

sentences.english: These are remains of an abandoned radar station Chernobyl-2.
sentences.chinese: 這是切爾若貝利2號雷達站的遺蹟。

sentences.english: Hand-in-glove with radar was battle management.
sentences.chinese: 與雷達密切相關的是戰鬥管理。

sentences.english: The findings are based on detailed radar measurements of ice caps on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 這些發現是基於對火星冰冠的詳細雷達測定數據。

sentences.english: Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷達資料的網格化及拼圖在氣象業務中有重要的意義。

sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷達能量回程測繪形式是基本反射率圖。

sentences.english: Their radar system are better located and we have better radars.
sentences.chinese: 俄方的雷達系統被妥善的安配，我們有更先進的雷達。

sentences.english: Their radar system are better located and we have better radars.
sentences.chinese: 俄方的雷達系統被妥善的安配，我們有更先進的雷達。

sentences.english: There should be one target, whereas two targets are indicated in the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 本應該是一條船，在雷達屏幕上卻顯示兩條船。

sentences.english: It has been mapped by using ground-penetrating radar and seismic tests.
sentences.chinese: 人們已經用探地雷達和地震測試把它繪製出來。

sentences.english: The cross location is the uppermost location mode for the ship-borne microwave OTH radar.
sentences.chinese: 交叉定位是艦載微波超視距雷達最主要的定位方式。

sentences.english: Five Navy squadrons have already transitioned to the radar.
sentences.chinese: 美國五個海軍飛行中隊已經採用了該雷達。

sentences.english: We want a radar position during dumping. Please cover us on your radar.
sentences.chinese: 放油時我們需要雷達定位，請在雷達中觀察我們。

sentences.english: We want a radar position during dumping. Please cover us on your radar.
sentences.chinese: 放油時我們需要雷達定位，請在雷達中觀察我們。

sentences.english: The equipment is used for communications and radar jamming, as well as radar warning.
sentences.chinese: 設備通常用於通信和雷達干擾以及雷達告警等。

sentences.english: The equipment is used for communications and radar jamming, as well as radar warning.
sentences.chinese: 設備通常用於通信和雷達干擾以及雷達告警等。

sentences.english: Saab’s ARTHUR radar system locates incoming enemy projectiles and missiles.
sentences.chinese: ARTHUR雷達系統可定位敵方來襲炮彈和導彈。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
